articles.author: Akash Kharade
articles.title: Watch: Gautam Gambhir Reacts To Fans Chanting `Kohli, Kohli` During LSG`s IPL 2023 Match Against CSK - Zee News
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: It Still Hurts..., Indian Womens Hockey Team Captain Savita Punia On CWG 2022 Semifinal Shootout Controversy Against Australia This was not the first time that Gambhir and Kohli had clashed on the field, with a similar incident occurring during the…
articles.content: On May 3, 2023, Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) faced off against Chennai Super Kings in Match No. 45 of the Indian Premier League (IPL) at the Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium… [+1947 chars]
